ygData.subject: Re: Wisps
ygData.msgSnippet: The regular and greater lightstones are still there, it is just that now all of the wisps that used to not have any stones carry the burned out ones.  Keeps
ygData.messageBody:
The regular and greater lightstones are still there, it is just that now
all of the wisps that used to not have any stones carry the burned
out ones. Keeps people from knowing which wisps have the good
ones whereas it used to be very easy to tell which wisps had
stones and which didnt.

--Aaldiana
--------------------------------------------
High Elf
Cleric
Metal Babe
HonorBound (http://mav.nu/hb)
--------------------------------------------

> Date: Fri, 02 Jul 1999 03:23:36 -0400
> From: Mystik <mystik@...>
> Subject: Re: LVL9 spells and armor
>
> that's a really good idea, but getting the lightstones now is a
> bust...they took out looting lightstones and glightstones a while back
> with a path...now you get a burned out lightstone or a nosave
> lightstone...pretty much worthless....if you had one before the patch, you
> still have it...<have one on both my toons> but you can no longer loot
> em...you still get money off the wisps tho....just root and
> blast...doesn't always work, but it sure does help....if you need help,
> get a warrior with a combine (; they take the hits, and you can just blast
> away...what i did...(:
>
> (\/)ystik Spellchaser
> lv 38 <got my level tongiht (: *cheers*> cleric of The Rathe
> now...to get lv 39 for rez.....<G>
